short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sorts Letterboxd lists and filmographies by rating

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Letterboxd Sort by Rating extension is a Chrome extension that automatically sorts movies by rating on Letterboxd actor, director, producer, writer, cinematography pages, and user lists. It enhances your browsing experience on Letterboxd by instantly organizing movies based on their ratings.
